fr.insa.rennes.info.chemical.backend
Class OrderedIncrementStrategy

java.lang.Object
  fr.insa.rennes.info.chemical.backend.OrderedIncrementStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
IncrementStrategy
 class OrderedIncrementStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements IncrementStrategy

This class implements an ordered strategy iteration on reactives: the elements are selected in order of appearance in the the solution. Note that this order can be different than the insert order of the elements in the solution.

Author:
Andréolli Cédric, Boulanger Chloé, Cléro Olivier, Guellier Antoine, Guilloux Sébastien, Templé Arthur

Method Detail

increment

public void increment(SubIndexProviderSolution sipSol)
               throws ChemicalException
Increments the specified sub index provider of one step. Does not check the validity of the index provider, this is done in IndexProvider.increment().

Specified by:
increment in interface IncrementStrategy
Parameters:
sipSol - The sub index provider on solution that has to be incremented
Throws:
ChemicalException
